p: The viable yeast cell count increased from 5.21 to 6.61 log CFU/g wet PK in the first 24 h, and remained relatively stable thereafter with a final cell count of 6.5 log CFU/g wet PK at 72 h, as can be seen from Fig. 1. This indicated that the autoclaved PK supported the growth of Y. lipolytica in solid-state fermentation setup without any nutritional supplementation.
